name: Figchat
description:
Talk to your teammates directly inside a Figma frame. There’s no third-party servers or setup required, simply select the frame you want to comment on and chat away. Figchat renders all your comments as items within Figma itself.


Um... Figma already has a commenting tool?


It does! And it works well. Figchat was created to provide something a little different:


  • A chat based UI for your conversations
  • Use in a silent review setting to collate everyones thoughts in an organized manner
  • Add your own notes quickly when reviewing with your teammates or when thinking through a design
  • Have multiple different conversations about different frames simultaneously
  • View all comments in situ with the work, no need to dig into menus or closed comments
  • No third-party hosting of your comments, no tracking of your actions. Everything remains in Figma
  • Dark mode chats... just for kicks
